类 BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • BankAccount
  • 直接已知子类:
    CurrentAccount, JuniorAccount, SaverAccount
    public class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    This class a super class of bank account.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BankAccount

        public BankAccount​(java.lang.String accNo,
                   java.lang.String accName,
                   double balance,
                   java.lang.String type)
        The constructor
        参数:
        accNo - account No.
        accName - account names
        balance - account balance
        type - account type

    • 方法详细资料

      • checkStatus

        public void checkStatus()
        Get account status. 1 means activated. 0 means suspended.

      • deposit

        public java.lang.String deposit​(double amount,
                                java.lang.String type)
        Deposit money in two ways.
        参数:
        amount - the deposit amount
        type - the deposit type: cleared and un-cleared
        返回:
        deposit state

      • withdraw

        public int withdraw​(double amount)
        Withdraw money from account
        参数:
        amount - the withdraw money
        返回:
        withdraw state

      • suspend

        public void suspend()
        Suspend the account

      • reinstate

        public void reinstate()
        Reinstate the account

      • close

        public int close()
        返回:
        close account state, 1 means having balance, 0 means success

      • getAccountNo

        public java.lang.String getAccountNo()
        Get account No.
        返回:
        account No.

      • getAccountName

        public java.lang.String getAccountName()
        Get account name
        返回:
        account name

      • getBalance

        public double getBalance()
        Get account balance
        返回:
        account balance

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Get account type
        返回:
        account type

      • getStatus

        public int getStatus()
        Get account status
        返回:
        account status

      • getNo

        public static java.lang.String getNo()
        When open a new account, generate a new account No.
        返回:
        account No.
